name: cellframe-masternode-inspector
author: Mika Hyttinen (@CELLgainz)
description: A Python plugin to inspect and retrieve live system stats and cached multi-network stats for your Cellframe masternode. Supports multiple networks, caches data per network for performance, offloads to RPC nodes where possible (with fallback to local node for wallet queries), and provides a simple authenticated HTTP API for monitoring and management.
